<mxGraphModel>
  <root>
    <mxCell id="0"/>

    <mxCell id="telnet" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">telnet</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48">" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="telnet">
